name: 纪尧姆·里博

last_movies.title: 我一无所有：朗兹曼的《浩劫》

introduction: After studying photography and art history, the 54-year-old director, screenwriter and photographer was initially active in press photography and dedicated over 25 years to the theme of memory, particularly the Holocaust. His work has featured in major publications such as “Time Magazine”, “Le Monde” and “The New York Times”. He has also published several books on the Holocaust and his work has been exhibited in museums around the world, including the Jewish Heritage Museum in New York. Since 2014, he has focused on directing and screenwriting, with a strong interest in history and archival images.
